comments.message: Why are the stars forfeited? Shouldn't the balance be brought forward to next year. This reward system is getting from bad to worse.

Dear all Starbucks Addicts (although I admit I'm merely a recruit level addict), Stars were reset to Zero today. Let us all grieve.

But let us all remember, the number of stars you had were never going to be redeemed for anything (besides the free drink every 60 stars) anyway. It was just a points system to get Gold for the next year...

Plus. Free drink for every 60 stars!!
hi, if its limited to first 30 person, please let us know as well, the one i went, stock is available but i couldn't buy them and i even asked all my colleagues down just to buy disappointment.
how many slice of cake for one starbucks card???
And do you guys not know how to properly capitalise the name of your supposedly valued customer
RIP 400 points.. meanwhile I've completed the christmas stocking event and i didn't get the rewards or the email. Starbucks please shed some light into the matter :/
Is it while stock last or is it limited to 30 pieces? I'm at the Robinson Road City House Starbucks outlet. 1 last piece in the fridge but staff said only 30 pieces at $2 so no more!
This system is just to prevent us to get free drink. Bring back the old system. Buy 12 free 1. Already lost interest since when u almost reach gold, the points r going to be expired soon.

This is very sad because I have accumulated so much points in excess and it doesn't incentivize me to patronize Starbucks anymore after I hit 300 points right ? Shouldn't you consider carry forward for the excess points ? Or exchange for some drinks or something ?

What's the point of collecting 540+ points if the remaining 240+ got thrown away just like that? You guys want us to stop patronising your stores once we reach the 300 points needed? It doesn't make sense at all!
Hi the starbucks android app is down for quite a while. Is there an app upgrade due? It keeps accusing me of not having internet connection, but i can log in to my account on a computer...
20anson Starbucks say only first 30 customers can get S$2. Is it truth?

First it was the system fault that causes long queues in the cafe.  Frustrated but the team is trying their best to help customers with the inconvenience.  Now the system is up,  but wipe out all the records of your customers. Rewards for gold members are really nothing to rave about.  Since today is your 1st year,  please review the programme and make it more attractive.

I have like 655 star and its depressing that the star will be gone! Can I roll over?

But when does this promo end? Or has it ended?
where are my stars? 300plus stars gone for nothing!  we can make use the points to redeem free drink.
What happened to points earned exceeding 300? I've just spent quite abit yesterday and had much earlier crossed my 300 mark but all rewards beyond 300 gone?!
Everyone is freaking out their stars gone to zero and login at the same time that is why it is down?

Oh dear! I didn't know the star points reset on 13th November. I shot of 10 star point to hit Gold status. Now too late. The point reset to zero. I though it expire on 31st December. @Starbucks Singapore, why never warn us? Should have listen to my friend, Ivan to top up another $10 that day on 10th Nov at PS. hai.
Starbucks Singapore, How do I enjoy this reward as the Starbucks card system down?? I visited capitaland tower store, a signboard stated rewards card payment not accepted due to system down

Hi Starbucks Singapore, just a feedback as an user - I tried to keep using the card for all payments as I thought I can accumulate as much points as possible where it can be carried forward. With this term, which I have overlooked it, doesn't give me the incentive to patronize Starbucks after I gotten my 300 points for the year. It's like  once I hit my 'KPI', I don't care le. :) So that is something that you may want to consider about? Thanks! It's Friday!
Need to remember this for later.. Cielo Morato Cabrera

Cool, my points got reset to zero, acct cant login, tried creating new acct and was told the card number is invalid (yet i can still swipe the card at the outlet). I only recieved the card in january so theres no reason to reset the points. Starbucks just pawned me....time to say goodbye
So annoyed that it's stated as while stocks last but it's only for the 1st 30 per outlet. Misleading much? There were so many pieces left.
Wanted to use the starbucks card... but the system at MW outleatis down....
